content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on my back patio watching and filming wild life and observing the clouds. i saw a glowing sphere coming from the east moving toward the northwest and upwards very slowly. i grabbed my camera and began filming. i couldn't see the object in the view finder so i only got a few seconds of footage. the orb appears much smaller on film than it did to my eyes. after one minute i grabbed my binoculars to get a closer look at the object. i have drawn what i saw. i have never seen an orb in the daytime and have never seen anything like what i saw before.
i am feeling extremely disturbed and perplexed. i don't know if what i saw was machine or organic or some sort of entity.
i watched it for 5 or 6 minutes until it disappeared into or out of the upper atmosphere.
sequence: 
1. main orb appeared. i tried to film it. 
2. decided to look at it with binoculars. 
3. observed sphere pulsating colors. 
4. observed a small group of white specks above sphere. 
5. observed 3-4 small orbs dropping from large sphere. 
6. observed white specks above sphere elongate upwards. lost sight.
content.summary: Jelly-like sphere dropping smaller opague orbs

content.detailedDescription: Awoke at 4:15am and looked out towards the eastern sky to see a very bright orb/disc-like object never before observed in that direction at that height (about 30 degrees above the horizon).  woke my wife up to observe along with me.  object glowed too brightly to be a star and was too close to be a planet.  captured a cell-phone picture of it.  object gradually faded away towards the east becoming smaller as it left.  it was gone by 4:45am.  definitely a ufo!  we are believers now!
content.summary: Awoke at 4:15am and looked out towards the eastern sky to see a very bright orb/disc-like object never before observed in that direction at that height.  object glowed too brightly to be a star and was too close to be a planet.

content.detailedDescription: I got up to use the bathroom shortly before 1 am. i was looking at the stars through the open window, when i noticed that one of them was moving. at first i thought that i must just be so tired that my eyes were playing tricks on me. i kept watching and the light bobbed randomly in all directions, and a couple of times even moved around in a circle. the color of the light changed randomly, including white, red, orange, and yellow. at times i think i saw fainter lights shoot out from the main light that was bobbing around, but they were so faint that i'm not positive. some of my thoughts while observing--"that's a ufo. i'm actually seeing a ufo. i thought that if this ever happened i'd be a lot more scared. i'm really glad that thing seems so far away." i watched until the light dropped behind the trees across the street from my house. i considered getting in the car and driving to where i could get an unobstructed view but was too scared to do so by myself.
content.summary: Red/orange/yellow/white bobbing light--would have mistaken this for a star if it hadn't been moving.

content.detailedDescription:
I went on the terrace of my building around 3 in the evening (you can see the exact time on the photos) just to chill and drink a couple of beers. this was the first time in like 10 days that i took my camera with me. i was scanning completely cloudless sky looking for them. not the five minutes i sat there i saw in the sky just in front of me white orb. it was simply standing up in the air. as you know i am still feeling lousy as usual. i felt later that it was something like a support for me. ok, to go on. it was simply standing in one place for 2-3 minutes. i could not zoom directly on it because for this i would need better camera. but the orb is still visible on those photos. it stood there for a couple of minutes and then it started moving in my direction. it did that for a minute or so and then simply disappeared from the sky. i did my sign with the fingers and said yea. it again looked cool. i kept scanning the sky trying to see some more of them and a couple of minutes after the orb there was a long one. that is on the last two photos. it simply appeared in one patch of the sky, started slowly gliding over it for a minute or so and then vanished. whenever you a plain flying over the same thing you can watch all the way when they cross the sky from one hill to another. they do not disappear and appear just like that. plus, as you know i feel them. i do. 

the day before yesterday i say a ufo (the long one) shaped as a paragliding wing. just over the hill top on my left side. it did not stay there long. just briefly. the same red color as on the other photos. i did not have my camera with me. 

a week ago i was around 9 in the morning in irvana���s apartment. we were simply sitting, drinking beer and chilling. she did not sleep the previous night at all and i was still drunk from the previous night, so we simply continued with the beer. she looks through the window and asks me ��� what the hell is this. i look through. there is a white-red sphere doing transformations like on the previous photos and flying maybe 20-30 meters from her building. i did not have my camera with me. we both did signals with our hands and started laughing. the sphere went behind the building and we did not see the person any more. it was cool though.

best regards 

senin
content.summary: I was sitting on my terrace feeling bad and they decided to lift up my spirits a bit.

content.detailedDescription:
My boyfriend and i were having dinner on his deck, july 9, 2012, at about 9:15 p.M. (2100 hrs) cst.  the deck faces west. this occurred over griffith/schererville, indiana.
at 9:30 p.M., (2130 hrs), i was facing northwest, and turned to look at the grill, which was a few feet behind and to the left of me. a very bright light in the southwest sky caught my eye. i got up to check it out, as there were branches in the way.  i told my boyfriend to come look at the ufo, which he did. 
in the sky, at about 10:00, was a large bright light in the southwest that seemed to be moving, more like drifting, then hovering, while it changed colors from "stop-light" red, to orange, to  yellow-gold, then orange again, and eventually back to red. the light flickered as it changed color, however, the lights were not following a set sequence, nor were there any aviation lights, such as strobes. 
the light had moved from southwest to east for perhaps a minute, then hung in the sky, simply hovering while it put on it's light show. it was beautiful to look at, as the colors were so vivid. the  movement was far too slow to be a plane, and there was absolutely no sound, nor was there any plume or visual interference (heat mirage effect/mist etc.).
we watched it til it disappeared behind some clouds, moving southeast. 
at first, my boyfriend thought it was a plane, til he watched it for a few minutes, then he remarked with surprise, that it could be a ufo.  as for myself, i was thrilled and awed. it's too bad it disappeared behind the clouds, as i was hoping it would come closer.  
we went back to sit down and eat and then we heard a jet moving from southeast, presumably by the sound, to northeast. while there are several small airports in the area, and we often see and hear passenger jets, as well as choppers, and light planes, this sounded more like a fighter, but it did not change course towards where the light had been.
it is important to note that besides there not being a sequential pattern to the light color changes, that the actual display time of each color change was variable and random as well.
content.summary: Large very bright light in evening sky that changed from red to orange to yellow etc. no sound, no plume.

content.detailedDescription: I was setting in a lawn chair reading the bible and i got to a part where god said go out in the field or meadow or something and i will show you a sign so for some reason i walked out into my grannys pastor and turned around and then across the road in the field i saw a silver bullet shaped ufo with no emission trail or anything flying over the top of the trees in a straight like i watched it until it was to far to see
content.summary: I saw a silver bullet flying over the top of the trees

content.detailedDescription:
Sunday 07-08-2012 time;10:13pm cdt.
near liberty missouri.
azimuth:78 deg., viewed to north, direction of travel from east to west.Duration of observation 2-3 mins.

my partner and i stepped outside to smoke a cigarette be for going to bed. i noticed the super brilliant
orange/red spherical object just over the rooftop. she also witnessed this event. orb/object was surrounded
in a conical iridescence, possibly ionization from the atmosphere, which varied in shape aft of the object and
decreased in shape and visibility further downrange to the west.Initially the object size at first sighting overhead
was the size of a "bb" held at arms length.
 appx altitude was 30-40,000 feet, ceiling:unlimited. to slow to be meteoric. to low to be a satellite.
i am ruling out aircraft military/commercial and this was not an iridium satellite flash sighting folks...Anyone else see this?
i have uploaded my photo shop rendering of the object and it is spot on!
content.summary: Brilliant orange/red orb

content.detailedDescription: I was in the traylor and i went and sat on the porch but felt like i shouldnt be outside it was dark and i was watching the stars i noticed this one that looked like it was moving back and forth then it flew at me really fast i thought it was going to hit me and crash i jumped up opened the door and ran inside screaming and told my husband and mother in law and my husbands nephew they said that it couldnt be so and i opened the door and looked and it was setting in its original spot in the sky i pointed it out to them but they didnt believe me i know the beings were messing with me because i had seen a ufo up close a few nights before and i closed the door and didnt go back outside that night
content.summary: I saw a light that looked like a star but knew it wasnt

content.detailedDescription: I was just a child going to school on a bicycle in altus, okla. heading south just at intersection before school. i saw the saucer come in very fast and come to an abrupt hover, about 400 to 500 ft. above ground. the traffic cop who was directing traffic at the intersection that morning saw cars stop next to me and the people got out and were staring up at the saucer as i was and the officer turned and watched too. everyone around was looking up at it as it hovered, then panels of windows appeared around the center of the disc and human form persons were looking out. this lasted about 20 to 30 seconds and then the panels became opoaque again and then the saucer moved westward at an astonishing speed without sound and did a 90 degree turn south and went out of sight in that direction. a few seconds later it returned to the same spot it had left and came to a hover again. it only hovered there about 15 seconds more before it moved west at a high rate of speed and suddenly went straight up and disappeared at an astonishing rare of speed. then an f-86 jet fighter left the nearby air force base and went westward as if to look for the object. the air force meteorologists said it was a reflection of light from one of the shiny new b-47's at the base shining on a cloud of moisture above the town. it was clear as a bell that morning and not a cloud of anything in the sky. nothing was ever mentioned about it again. my father was in the us air force at the time and in 1959 revealed to me that he was in the crew of the first airplane to arrive on the scene of the roswell crash and gave me details on the clean-up there and that he was the one that gave the weather balloon to the commander of carswell afb and helped him concoct the story the government wanted to cover it up. my father told me not to tell anyone of the story while he was still alive because he knew of several officers that were there let out some facts and they each met mysterious deaths shortly afterward. the bulk of the surviving ship was taken away on board a flat bed truck with a tarp covering it, in the dark of night. there were bodies recovered and the last one died before they left the scene. they were packed in crates with dry ice to preserve them and were taken in a plane, but he did not reveal where the planes' destination was.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Sighted flying saucer as it came to hover about 1000 ft. away.

content.detailedDescription: I was in the traylor in cordova,al i came outside i walked out in the yard i looked over to my right and hovering over this garage on the other side of the train tracks was this metallic silver egg shaped ufo it came towards me and stopped about 20 ft from me it was over the grave yard at that point it hovered with no sound there was no thought running through my head i just watched it it turned where i could see the complete side of it then i noticed a little purple light on the back of it then it went about 5 mph and flew over the top of the houses i watched it until i couldnt see it any longer i knew it was not man it flew in straight lines until it stopped and turned it never faded or nothing it was a solid object
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I came outside i saw it setting over a garage it came towards me stopped at 20ft from me hovered then turned and flew off going like 5 mph

content.detailedDescription: I was outside to enjoy the cool moist air after the record breaking heatwave just days earlier, also having alot of family issues on my mind, so i decided to go outside and enjoy the fresh air and peace and quiet. i was looking at the moon rising in the east but noticed a yellow-white light behind a tree next to our road to my northeast. i pulled out my cell phone from my pocket to look at the time, that way i would know what time it was when i first noticed the object just in case it turns out to be an unknown object. i watched the light closely, at first it seemed stationary, but after about a minute it gradually started to move in a southwesterly direction. i went to my truck to grab my camera but i forgot that i brought it inside with me earlier. i turned on the camera on my cell phone and zoomed in as close as i could. i couldn't see the object on the screen, but i went ahead and took a picture of it anyway for further research on here. as it got directly in line with the moon (just above the moon) i could see a red blinking light underneath as well as a bright white light on the front, the back there was another white light, as it got to my southeast i noticed another white light, where i could see the lights were in a triangular formation. there was no sound that i could hear other than the traffic noise since i live less than a quarter mile from highway 41 and a csx railroad crossing. at 1:18 am 10 minutes after i first noticed the object, it moved to my south and disappeared in a bank of clouds, and never regained visual on it. i took a total of 8 photo's of this thing, neither of them turned out, but i am hoping further research might reveal what this object really was for sure. i will need to figure out how to upload photo's to this site with my cell phone because it's a replacement for my other one that i broke about a month ago.
content.summary: Triangular object moving towards mount carmel, il

content.detailedDescription:
On july 1st at my girlfriend and i were watching a few distant fireworks when we noticed a flying orange orb to the right of us. at first we belived it was a firework but when it did not alter shape, color or trajectory  we dismissed that theory.  it flew in a straight line across the sky smoothly. its appearance did not alter at all we were not scared of it but were more curious of what it was. we watched it for several minutes and then were distracted by more fireworks. when we looked back it was gone. a couple of minutes latter another orb appeared to our left. it looked excatly the same and appeared to be following the same flight pattern. we watched this one for a while till it slowly faded away. 
     on july 4th my sister and her husband were observing fireworks when they noticed a orange orb flying through the sky. after observing it for many minutes it faded out. several minutes latter they noticed another identical orb and observed it for a similar amount of time till that one too faded out.
     she only told me about this about an hour ago so when she descirbed the orbs in the almost exact way that i observed them i was shocked. none of us has observed the orbs again.
content.summary: Flying orange orb travrling straight acrosse sky. faded out and latter another identical orb appeared on the opposite side of the sky and traveled the same straight path.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in the back patio area of my house. i saw a bright yellow light appear around 30 degrees in east over some trees.  my first thought was someone had shot of some fireworks.  object traveled directly overhead east to west.  spotted at 9:30 disappeared into west horizon at 9:37 pm.  looked through binoculars and saw a grayish spehrical outline above light as it moved to west  no noise when it passed overhead.  winds were light and variable.  object appeared to be moving faster than a commercial jet would on final approach to standiford field. the light seem to flicker almost like a candle.
content.summary: Yellow flickering orb moved west to east 10pm speed 100mph+

content.detailedDescription: It was on the 4th of july.  we where having a good time shooting off firecrackers when these lights appeared, in the sky, towards tulsa.  my younger brother thought it was nothing, but i know a ton about astronomy.  i knew it wasn't a star, because the lights where moving across the sky.  even though we have an airport and military base nearby, i knew it wasn't a plane, because there where 6 lights, in the formation or shape, of a triangle!!  also, they weren't blinking red or green.  they weren't blinking at all, and there wasn't any noise.  all i knew is that it wasn't a series of bright stars or planes.  then it hit me!!!  they where ufos!!  this whole time my younger brother was shooting off firecrackers, but i was paying attention to the ufos.  i was trying to use my phone's camera to take a picture, but i had to clear memory space for the lights.  unfortunately, by the time i got memory space, the ufo's where gone.
content.summary: It was star-like, but there where 6 of them in a triangular shape/formation.  no sound emitted from objects.

content.detailedDescription: It was a sunny warm day, no clouds in the sky. i did see an airplane and a helicopter before but it stood there and it made no sound. from were i was it looked the size of an airplane. there was a black line through the metallic pellet object i believe to be a row of windows. how it happened was kind of funny. i was in the 3 foot end of the pool trying to get on the darn raft why my friends were in the 6 foot end. i was finally on the raft when i lay down and see something in the sky. i looked at it for 7 sec before trying to get a closer look but the raft and myself started drifting away to a point were all i could see was a tree. i tried so hard to get back but it didn't work. i got of the raft and swam over myself only to find it gone ?! i didn't tell anyone until i returned home. the sighting was random and made me ponder what the heck ! what kind of object jest floats there ?!
content.summary: In pool swimming with friends, got on float raft on pool. laying down, looking up and noticed this object. watched it for 7 seconds

content.detailedDescription: Was sitting around a campfire at a campground by pigeon lake , alberta with two family members. one of them said "look, a meteorite". we looked and immediately realized this was no meteor. we saw  a bright orange orb, spherical in shape, moving at a rate of speed unattainable by aircraft that i have seen. it was silent and moved in a straight line at a constant speed. we three agreed that we have never seen anything like it or even remotely like it. it traversed the sky from horizon to horizon, south to  north in about 20 seconds. the sky was clear and warm with little or no wind.
content.summary: Witnessed a bright orange orb moving from south to north a very high rate of speed. no sound detected on a warm still, clear night. witnessed with two other people.
We noticed a reddish orange hovering light. pulled over and photographed object. object was hove

content.detailedDescription: Around 8:50 pm est. standard time toward the w-nw. after just arriving home with my brother and exiting my vehicle, i looked to the sky to observe stars and/or planets and saw the object in the sky. i first thought it was a star or planet because it was not moving, after approximately two minutes i noticed a streak behind the object at which time i thought it was an airplane or similar object. upon noticing that the object was moving to slow to be a plane i continued to watch it at which time i noticed it was glowing red, orange and yellow. i watched the object until 9:06 pm est. time at that time the object vanished beyond the horizon, during the time i observed the object it went from a hovering or still state in the sky to a slow moving state with a white streak behind it. the object moved toward the west in a straight line while veering slightly to the left. while watching this object move though the sky my initial reaction and feeling was astonishment.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Red-orange round glowing object in sky that lasted around 20-25 minutes

content.detailedDescription: Object initially did not move which led me to believe it was a star or one of the planets visible in july.  then, the object began to move, emitting a streak of light.  this was not a vapor trail.  this was light.  the object was in clear view for 25 mins, much longer than an airplane would have been.  i have been able to explain everything ive ever seen in the sky except this.  it almost resembled an extremely slow moving and sporadic comet.  very strange and unusual.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Strange star like object which began to move across sky slowly and deliberately with occasional direction change

content.detailedDescription: On 6-20-2012 at 10pm mountain time, my 4 dogs ran outside, stood in the middle of my backyard, and barked in a high pitch, looking up at the sky. i ran outside to see what was wrong. it was a clear night, the stars were bright,the dogs all stopped barking at the same time. suddenly a bright white object shot out from behind the stars and startled me. i felt a little fearful. it stopped and hovered for a second, then suddenly at a fast speed it headed east within a split second and was out of sight. i did not hear any noise or see any lights or vapors. the dogs and i went back inside the house.I felt a little shaken from the experience,sounds silly, but i think i was afraid of being abducted.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: A bright white object shot out from behind the stars and startled me, hovered for a second, then at a high speed headed east

content.detailedDescription:
I am reporting a sighting on july 2, 2012 at approx 9:pm, first sighted in the south/southeast and later moved and disappeared in that general direction.

it was a glowing orange color, like a mercury light and the shape was like the traditional domed saucer.  it caught my eye because it stopped and stood still for a while and then slowly disappeared.  it had to be fairly good size because it was a long way up, and it got smaller and smaller as it trended southeast.  the night was very clear.  no clouds.

this area is a flight path for charlotte, nc airport and i have seen many types of airplanes, helicopters, etc. pass over.
content.summary: It was a glowing orange color, like a mercury light and the shape was like the traditional domed saucer.

content.detailedDescription:
1- on my roof taking a break from work
2- a reflective glint
3- it seems to tumble in slow motion
4- was reflecting and blinking
5-just amazed
6- blinked and they were gone
content.summary: I saw a falling and then hovering object track slowly across the sky and then noticed a second one slightly above and further away from the first one. the were both reflecting light and blink in this random pattern. i then heard two military attack choppe

content.detailedDescription:
on the 4th of july 2012, 4 adults and 2 teenage children were sitting on our back porch talking at       11:05 pm after the holiday celebration, when i noticed a fireball type craft flying in the sky horizontally from southeast to northwest, from ferguson, mo to st. charles, mo or alton, il area. once i pointed it out to the others they all saw it too.  it flew slowly and the path it flew was straight, but did vary every so often and go up or down slightly, it flew over us and continued on until it was out of our sight, descending slightly the further it went. 
the size of the fireball type craft was approximately   1/8 to ��� the size of the moon as we see it on earth.  the craft seemed rather jagged like it was on fire. it didn���t appear to have a shape other than a jagged ball. it was not close to us but was easily visible.  the craft made no noise, as the planes etc. we see often in our area do. it was very deep reddish orange.
  this is the second craft i have seen in this general area.  july 4th 1997 i saw a very large craft over hwy 370 near st. charles mo, as did thousands of other fireworks watchers.
content.summary: Fireball st. louis, mo july 4th 2012

content.detailedDescription: It was 7-8-2012. i went outside at about 9:30 pm to take out the trash.I was with a friend. we stayed out there and talked for about 5 minutes and when we were about to go inside, he looked up, and seen something. we thought it was a shooting star, so we made wishes. but then, it did a 180 degree turn, and flew slowly over by the stars, and got dimmer until it faded away. so we talked about it, and looked around the sky. we seen about 5 more of those. they looked like stars, but seemed to be intelligently flying. we must have seen about 6 planes fly in the same direction over the span of 10 minutes, so we figured they know something is going on. we were laying on the blacktop driveway, looking at the stars. i remember seeing an abnormal amount of triangle shaped constellations, they were all perfect triangles. we noticed every time we seen one of those things, it faded away into a triangle constellation. after about 10 minutes of seeing nothing, a bright white light shot by , fast , and it left no trail. it was small compared to the sky, it only looked a few meters long. but from the ground it will look smaller. so after that, we freaked out. we were talking about it as even more planes flew by, and we kept seeing those things , they looked like stars, and kept fading away into the triangle constellations. then we seen one, we were watching it fly by, then we seen a bright white light flash, and it was gone. that was the last time we seen the bright light. it only felt like an hour, but it was late, so he was going to go home.But then we seen another one. so we watched it. to our amazement it stopped dead in its tracks along the outline of a triangle constellation.He could not see it anymore, but i could, i tried to point it out to him but he could not find it, so he watched my reaction to what i seen. it was hovering there, moving a tiny bit around. then, i flipped out. i saw a black shadow looking think shoot out of it at super speed. the another, and another. i was freaking out then. another plane passed and the reddish think faded away before the plane passed it. then it re-appeared! it was amazing! then, it took of fast as light. and my friend left and i went inside. it was the weirdest thing iv'e seen in my life.We are going to look again tonight.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Alot of things me and my friend both seen.This was on 7-8-2012

content.detailedDescription: While at work, a coworker and i stepped outside to talk for a minute. we then noticed a rather large, metallic object that a looked like it was hovering above the field just adjacent to us. it was hard to judge the distance but we don't think it was very high, maybe 1k feet or so and to the best of our ability wed judged the size to be somewhere in the neighborhood of 50 to 60 feet in diameter. it just hovered there. we watched it for a few minutes freaked out as to what is could be. ive seen crop dusters in the area for years, and the helicopters that fly in and out of the hospital and this was nothing like that. while we watched it it made no sound at all, absolutely none. then spontaneously the object darted off. it didn't travel horizontally very fast at all rather it accelerated vertically extremely quickly. it was gone within a few seconds. i have no idea what i saw today and have spent the past hour or so searching the internet looking at pics and for information. that is how i happened across this site. whatever it was, it was worth reporting
content.summary: Observed odd object in sky for about 3 mins. hovered, then shot off in a diagonal  manner

content.detailedDescription: Me and three other passengers were driving down i 691 west at approximately 8:30 p.M. on jul 3rd 2012. ironically we were having a conversation about the movie independence day and ufo's i turned to the left facing i 691 east and strangely enough i observed an orange red object that appeared to be a sphere i could not make out the exact shape but it was def not a conventional aircraft i see all kinds of planes and aircraft flying around and i've been on a couple military bases so i know how to distinguish most things in the sky besides natural phenomenon i'm knowledgeable on ufo's and know one when i see it. it started off hovering over the east side of the highway i was on the west side. after i observed the object i turned to the passenger next to me and said what is that light. as soon as the driver saw it he freaked out and started yelling at that point it was traveling over the east side over our car and it hovered for a few seconds at a low altitude probably 500-700ft it then traveled across the highway towards hubbard park the object basically flew east a few seconds than went across the highway over our car (west side) than hovered off the highway i lost the object after we passed exit 3 on 691 east. we deduced that it was not a meteorite (that was my very first conjecture as i am a little more serious than the passengers they wanted to assume it was a ufo i tried to deduce it down to something logical but could not and this even alarmed me i have other ufo events i would like to discuss with an investigator in private but do not wish to disclose them here you can contact me anytime on the house line
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: The object that i saw was orange red it appeared to be sperical in nature but it also seemed solid i saw an outline but could not make it out.

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside with my 23 year old nephew. we were sitting on the steps in front of my place. we both had 10x50 binoculars mounted on tripods. we were sky watching. 
at about 10:30 pm, i spot a glow round sphere moving north. it is moving away from us. it just seemed to appear....It glowed bright orange. it seemed to be accelerating. it went for about a mile northward and dimmed and disappeared. it was probably about 4,000 feet in altitude. it was about 4 or 5 miles away from us.
the second one came alone about 10:42 pm. it was almost straight above us when we saw it. it was moving very slow when we first saw it. it had a slight orange white glow to it. it was up higher than the first one. this one was at about 8,000 ft in attitude. within seconds of me getting it in view with my binoculars....... it speed up and continued to speed up for a few moments. it wasn't an instantly fast acceleration, but it got up to a very fast rate within a short distance. it was impressive. then it seemed to maintain this speed. it disappeared over the horizon. we saw this object for over a minute, but less than two minutes. this object moved in a straight line path and went north northeast. 
neither of these objects had any blinking light, no ffa marker lights. they glowed brightly, a solid steady light. no sound was heard. 
we have both seen these types of objects a few times and some were much closer than the two we observed on this night.
content.summary: Two orange spheres seen within 10 minutes apart. first one disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I was standing on my back deck, which faces south, and was observing the color of the clouds reflecting the sun. i am always watching the sky because of the multiple ufo sightings i've had in my lifetime. while looking straight up i noticed a very bright, reflective object with a black band in its mid-section traveling from north to south directly over our house. it was below the clouds at this time (there were different levels of clouds at this time). at first glance i thought it was a jet liner but then realized that it was to low and did not have wings (that were visible). it didn't match up at all with the thousands of jet planes i've seen while watching the skies. i heard no noise being produced. it kept a fixed speed as far as i could tell and never changed course while in my view. at this time i was excited as this was the most detailed ufo sighting by me. its outline was crisp and the black band was pitch black and the bright white surface i compare to a military luminary flare (i'm an army veteran). my 18 year old daughter came home at this moment and i called her outside and she witnessed about the last 15 seconds of its appearance until it disappeared into thick clouds. i estimate it disappeared into the clouds about 30-40 degrees above the southern horizon. just 1-2 hours before the sighting i had watched the video of the ufo with the black band over germany. i immediately grabbed my laptop and showed my daughter the video i had just watched and we were both in agreeance that what we had witnessed was very similar to the internet video. i've found other videos today which are very similar to what we seen. sadly, i do not own a photo or video camera to document my sightings but they are so common to me now that i kind of expect to see one on a semi regular basis.
content.summary: Bright missle shaped with black band in middle

content.detailedDescription:
I was aged 11 at the time and out in the street outside my friend's house. i remember the date because it was my parents' wedding anniversary. my brother and i had gone out so they could have a meal together at home. the road to my friend's house curved upwards, south and east and then levelled out facing east. as i reached the top of the hill and looked own the street i could see 3 red lights in the sky. they were spread out and appeared to be some distance away. the sky was completely clear and the lights were totally stationary. i pointed them out to my brother. i knocked on my friend's door and told him to come outside. his brother also came out. while we were looking at these lights they very rapidly changed formation, moving in an anti-clockwise direction from my perspective. having moved very quickly they stopped immediately and then remained stationary for 2-3 minutes. the lights were not flickering and there was nothing else in the sky. we were all very excited by this. the lights continued to change positions, sometimes extremely quickly and other times more slowly. their proximity to each other was not regular and they formed larger or smaller triangular shapes. to the best of my knowledge, the land in that direction was largely agricultural. we watched this for about half an hour until we (unbelievably now!) got a bit bored of watching it. i seem to remember seeing a small article in the local newspaper the following week, reporting on a sighting by a policemen of a red light in the sky over a village to the east of stevenage.

i was only 11 but these were not aircraft. i didn't bother telling any adults given that it was halloween. all 4 of us saw it. i don't know if the others remember it.
content.summary: 3 red lights changing positions very fast in triangular formation

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on the front porch at my workplace (which is a single family home) on a cool clear evening around 9:30 pm when i observed a green light move rapidly across the telephone lines on the opposite side of the street, about 100 feet away and 30 feet up the pole.

thinking it was just a plane's lights, i waited in vain for it to pass by. i heard no engine and saw no light for a few minutes, then the light passed over a nearby tree. 

the light was approximately 20 feet across in diameter, large enough to light up the whole treetop which was fully grown, similar to a helicopter search light (but dark green). it moved quickly, passing over the tree as if searching for something. i saw no object at all, and heard no sound.

the light was gone as quickly as it came. about 5 minutes passed, then i saw it again, the same large green light, over another tree further away, approximately 200 feet from me. the light covered the entire treetop, and appeared to be about 20 feet in diameter as it passed over the tree as if looking for something. 

it disappeared again and then lit up a different tree on a side street further away, before it vanished for good. i sat there confused as to what i had seen because there was no helicopter or plane sound at all. 

i still wonder what cast that light?

i researched this sighting online, and found a similar sighting from august 2010 in nearby duryea, pa., affecting a woman in her car. sounded very similar to what i saw.
content.summary: Saw green lights similar to a helicopter searchlight moving across treetops
